name: capricorn

[ C or U ] the tenth sign of the zodiac, relating to the period from 23 December to 20 January and represented by a goat with a fish's tail, or a person born during this period: She was born on Christmas Eve, 24 December, so her zodiac sign is Capricorn. I'm a Capricorn. Compare
Capricornus
More examplesFewer examplesCapricorn is an earth sign.Capricorns are supposed to be methodical, businesslike, and good with money.We seem happy to caricature people according to their star sign: balanced Librans, grumpy Capricorns.
